      • addShop

        public void addShop(@NotNull
                    @NotNull String world,
                    @NotNull
                    @NotNull Shop shop)
        Adds a shop to the world. Does NOT require the chunk or world to be loaded Call shop.onLoad by yourself
        Parameters:
        world - The name of the world
        shop - The shop to add

      • canBuildShop

        public boolean canBuildShop(@NotNull
                            @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                            @NotNull
                            @NotNull org.bukkit.block.Block b,
                            @NotNull
                            @NotNull org.bukkit.block.BlockFace bf)
        Checks other plugins to make sure they can use the chest they're making a shop.
        Parameters:
        p - The player to check
        b - The block to check
        bf - The blockface to check
        Returns:
        True if they're allowed to place a shop there.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all shops from memory and the world. Does not delete them from the database. Call this on plugin disable ONLY.

      • loadShop

        public void loadShop(@NotNull
                     @NotNull String world,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull Shop shop)
        Loads the given shop into storage. This method is used for loading data from the database. Do not use this method to create a shop.
        Parameters:
        world - The world the shop is in
        shop - The shop to load

      • removeShop

        public void removeShop(@NotNull
                       @NotNull Shop shop)
        Removes a shop from the world. Does NOT remove it from the database. * REQUIRES * the world to be loaded Call shop.onUnload by your self.
        Parameters:
        shop - The shop to remove

      • getActions

        public HashMap<UUID,Info> getActions()
        Returns:
        Returns the HashMap. Info contains what their last question etc was.

      • getShopIterator

        public Iterator<Shop> getShopIterator()
        Returns a new shop iterator object, allowing iteration over shops easily, instead of sorting through a 3D hashmap.
        Returns:
        a new shop iterator object.

      • getAllShops

        public Collection<Shop> getAllShops()
        Returns all shops in the whole database, include unloaded.

        Make sure you have caching this, because this need a while to get all shops

        Returns:
        All shop in the database

      • getShops

public @NotNull HashMap<String,HashMap<ShopChunk,HashMap<org.bukkit.Location,Shop>>> getShops()

        Returns:
        a hashmap of World - Chunk - Shop
